body_html: I think I just hacked around the problem of not having lists of checkpointables be supported. I wanted to build a solution that did not require me to change model code. But I now see, that my shot at it backfired.

body: I think I just hacked around the problem of not having lists of checkpointables be supported. I wanted to build a solution that did not require me to change model code. But I now see, that my shot at it backfired.
